heading: Media Coverage
subheading: Explore recent RPT in the news segments showcasing our work and impact in the industry.

articles.title: Crain's Detroit Business Podcast Feature
articles.description: Our team was featured on Crain's Detroit Business podcast, discussing essential factors to consider when selecting the right space for your small business. Gain expert insights to help you make informed decisions for your business's growth and success.

articles.title: Hour Detroit Feature 2022
articles.description: Our Robotic Precision Therapy Clinic was highlighted in a dedicated article on Hour Detroit, spotlighting our advanced robotic therapy solutions and commitment to patient-focused pain relief.

articles.title: Troy Times – C & G Newspapers (July 2025)
articles.description: Robotic Precision Therapy Clinic was featured in the July 2025 edition of the Troy Times by C & G Newspapers. This article highlights our innovative use of the RX2600 robotic system, showcasing how our clinic delivers effective, lasting solutions for sciatica back pain.
articles.linkText: Read the feature in Troy Times

articles.title: The Eagle – C & G Newspapers (July 2025)
articles.description: RPT Clinic was featured on page 17 of the July 2025 edition of The Eagle, published by C & G Newspapers. This spotlight emphasizes our clinic's advanced robotic therapy services and highlights how our innovative RX2600 technology is helping the Metro Detroit community.

articles.title: Hour Detroit Health Guide 2025
articles.description: Our Robotic Precision Therapy clinic was featured with a prominently placed ad on the very first page of the 2025 Hour Detroit Health Guide, highlighting our commitment to excellence in patient care.

articles.title: C&G News – Birmingham-Bloomfield Eagle (May 2025)
articles.description: Our clinic and the innovative RX2600 robotic therapy were showcased in C&G's 'Spotlight on Health' feature, titled Sciatica Pain Doesn't Stand a Chance: The Robot Helping Metro Detroit Heal.

articles.title: Fox 2 News Morning Interview - Robotic Precision Therapy
articles.description: Dr. Colin Elkins appeared live on WJBK Fox 2 News to demonstrate Robotic Precision Therapy and explain how this innovative treatment helps patients dealing with chronic pain.

articles.title: Channel 7 Detroit Feature - Advanced Pain Relief Technology
articles.description: WXYZ Channel 7 Detroit highlighted Robotic Precision Therapy as an innovative solution for pain management in Metro Detroit. The segment explored how RPT uses precise, targeted pressure to address chronic pain conditions.

articles.title: TV 20 News Coverage - Breakthrough Therapy for Chronic Pain
articles.description: WMYD TV 20 News featured RPT Clinic's groundbreaking approach to treating chronic pain and muscle tension. The December 2021 segment showcased how Robotic Precision Therapy is helping patients in Southeast Michigan find relief from conditions.
